answers.1: After this battle Hercules led his troops back to the city
answers.7: Creon decorated Hercules with great honors
answers.9: Creon gave Hercules his daughter in marriage
answers.10: Creon decorated Hercules with great honors, and gave Hercules his daughter in marriage
answers.11: Creon decorated Hercules with great honors, and gave him his daughter in marriage
answers.12: Creon moreover decorated Hercules with great honors, and gave him his daughter in marriage
answers.16: After a short time he was led back to health
answers.17: After a short time he was led back to health, and on account of this crime was afflicted with great grief
answers.18: After a short time he was led back to health, and on account of this crime was afflicted with great grief; soon he fled from the city and withdrew into the forest
answers.19: For the citizens did not want to talk with him
